{{Wireless embedded system |brand=T-Com |model=Speedport W723V |revision=Typ B |series=N300 |asin=B004LMZMXS;DE; |is_manuf=No |manuf=Arcadyan |manuf_model=VGV8539 |manuf_rev=JW22 |availability=common |est_release_date=01/2011 |type=wireless router, dsl modem |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Lantiq |cpu1_model=PSB 80920;XWAY™ VRX288 (PSB 80920); |cpu1_cspeed=500 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Eon |fla1_model=EN29LV640B-90TIP |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Zentel |ram1_model=A3S12D40ETP-G5 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag=no |serial=yes |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43222 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Lantiq |eth_chip2_model=PEF 7071V |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags=ADSL2+, VDSL |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid_regex=WLAN-XXXXXX |default_ip=192.168.2.1 |oui=74:31:70 |oui_eth=74:31:70 }} {{TagLine|Telekom Speedport W723V DSL-Router}}
[http://www.chip.de/preisvergleich/168197/Uebersicht-Deutsche-Telekom-Speedport-W-723V.html Telekom Speedport W723V] ''(802.11 abgn, 4x RJ45, DSL-Modem, USB 2.0)''
*CPU: [[Lantiq]] XWAY™ VRX288 (PSB 80920), @500MHz xDSL SoC *Eth: [[Lantiq]] PEF 7071V, GbE 10/100/1000Mbps PHY *Wlan SSID: '''WLAN-XXXXXX''' (last 3 bytes of MAC)
===See also=== *[http://www.amazon.de/Telekom-Speedport-WLAN-Router-NAS-Funktionalität-IP-Telefonie/dp/B00D1AN56C/''Telekom Speedport W724V''] - GbE, [https://telekom.tarife-angebote.de/speedport/w724v VoIP/DECT]
